directions: Put gelatin mix into a large bowl. Pour boiling water over the gelatin and stir to dissolve powder completely. Let the mixture sit to thicken slightly, 5 to 10 minutes.
Stir sugar into the gelatin mixture to dissolve; add oranges, pecans, cranberries and apples and stir.
Refrigerate the gelatin mixture until set, at least 3 hours.
ingredients: 2 (6 ounce) packages cherry-flavored gelatin mix (such as Jell-O®)
title: Mrs. O's Cranberry Relish
